member.name: T:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric
member.summary:
Flags used with the Windows API (User32.dll):GetSystemMetrics(SystemMetric smIndex)
This Enum and declaration signature was written by Gabriel T. Sharp ai_productions@verizon.net or osirisgothra@hotmail.com Obtained on pinvoke.net, please contribute your code to support the wiki!

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXSCREEN
member.summary: Width of the screen of the primary display monitor, in pixels. This is the same values obtained by calling GetDeviceCaps as follows: GetDeviceCaps( hdcPrimaryMonitor, HORZRES).

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYSCREEN
member.summary: Height of the screen of the primary display monitor, in pixels. This is the same values obtained by calling GetDeviceCaps as follows: GetDeviceCaps( hdcPrimaryMonitor, VERTRES).

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYVSCROLL
member.summary: Width of a horizontal scroll bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXVSCROLL
member.summary: Height of a horizontal scroll bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYCAPTION
member.summary: Height of a caption area, in pixels.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXBORDER
member.summary: Width of a window border, in pixels. This is equivalent to the SM_CXEDGE value for windows with the 3-D look.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYBORDER
member.summary: Height of a window border, in pixels. This is equivalent to the SM_CYEDGE value for windows with the 3-D look.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXDLGFRAME
member.summary: Thickness of the frame around the perimeter of a window that has a caption but is not sizable, in pixels. SM_CXFIXEDFRAME is the height of the horizontal border and SM_CYFIXEDFRAME is the width of the vertical border.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYDLGFRAME
member.summary: Thickness of the frame around the perimeter of a window that has a caption but is not sizable, in pixels. SM_CXFIXEDFRAME is the height of the horizontal border and SM_CYFIXEDFRAME is the width of the vertical border.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYVTHUMB
member.summary: Height of the thumb box in a vertical scroll bar, in pixels

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXHTHUMB
member.summary: Width of the thumb box in a horizontal scroll bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXICON
member.summary: Default width of an icon, in pixels. The LoadIcon function can load only icons with the dimensions specified by SM_CXICON and SM_CYICON

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYICON
member.summary: Default height of an icon, in pixels. The LoadIcon function can load only icons with the dimensions SM_CXICON and SM_CYICON.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXCURSOR
member.summary: Width of a cursor, in pixels. The system cannot create cursors of other sizes.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYCURSOR
member.summary: Height of a cursor, in pixels. The system cannot create cursors of other sizes.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYMENU
member.summary: Height of a single-line menu bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXFULLSCREEN
member.summary: Width of the client area for a full-screen window on the primary display monitor, in pixels. To get the coordinates of the portion of the screen not obscured by the system taskbar or by application desktop toolbars, call the SystemParametersInfo function with the SPI_GETWORKAREA value.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYFULLSCREEN
member.summary: Height of the client area for a full-screen window on the primary display monitor, in pixels. To get the coordinates of the portion of the screen not obscured by the system taskbar or by application desktop toolbars, call the SystemParametersInfo function with the SPI_GETWORKAREA value.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYKANJIWINDOW
member.summary: For double byte character set versions of the system, this is the height of the Kanji window at the bottom of the screen, in pixels

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_MOUSEWHEELPRESENT
member.summary: Nonzero if a mouse with a wheel is installed; zero otherwise

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYHSCROLL
member.summary: Height of the arrow bitmap on a vertical scroll bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXHSCROLL
member.summary: Width of the arrow bitmap on a horizontal scroll bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_DEBUG
member.summary: Nonzero if the debug version of User.exe is installed; zero otherwise.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_SWAPBUTTON
member.summary: Nonzero if the left and right mouse buttons are reversed; zero otherwise.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_RESERVED1
member.summary: Reserved for future use

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_RESERVED2
member.summary: Reserved for future use

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_RESERVED3
member.summary: Reserved for future use

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_RESERVED4
member.summary: Reserved for future use

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXMIN
member.summary: Minimum width of a window, in pixels.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYMIN
member.summary: Minimum height of a window, in pixels.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXSIZE
member.summary: Width of a button in a window's caption or title bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYSIZE
member.summary: Height of a button in a window's caption or title bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXFRAME
member.summary: Thickness of the sizing border around the perimeter of a window that can be resized, in pixels. SM_CXSIZEFRAME is the width of the horizontal border, and SM_CYSIZEFRAME is the height of the vertical border.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYFRAME
member.summary: Thickness of the sizing border around the perimeter of a window that can be resized, in pixels. SM_CXSIZEFRAME is the width of the horizontal border, and SM_CYSIZEFRAME is the height of the vertical border.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXMINTRACK
member.summary: Minimum tracking width of a window, in pixels. The user cannot drag the window frame to a size smaller than these dimensions. A window can override this value by processing the WM_GETMINMAXINFO message.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYMINTRACK
member.summary: Minimum tracking height of a window, in pixels. The user cannot drag the window frame to a size smaller than these dimensions. A window can override this value by processing the WM_GETMINMAXINFO message

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXDOUBLECLK
member.summary: Width of the rectangle around the location of a first click in a double-click sequence, in pixels. The second click must occur within the rectangle defined by SM_CXDOUBLECLK and SM_CYDOUBLECLK for the system to consider the two clicks a double-click

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYDOUBLECLK
member.summary: Height of the rectangle around the location of a first click in a double-click sequence, in pixels. The second click must occur within the rectangle defined by SM_CXDOUBLECLK and SM_CYDOUBLECLK for the system to consider the two clicks a double-click. (The two clicks must also occur within a specified time.)

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXICONSPACING
member.summary: Width of a grid cell for items in large icon view, in pixels. Each item fits into a rectangle of size SM_CXICONSPACING by SM_CYICONSPACING when arranged. This value is always greater than or equal to SM_CXICON

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYICONSPACING
member.summary: Height of a grid cell for items in large icon view, in pixels. Each item fits into a rectangle of size SM_CXICONSPACING by SM_CYICONSPACING when arranged. This value is always greater than or equal to SM_CYICON.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_MENUDROPALIGNMENT
member.summary: Nonzero if drop-down menus are right-aligned with the corresponding menu-bar item; zero if the menus are left-aligned.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_PENWINDOWS
member.summary: Nonzero if the Microsoft Windows for Pen computing extensions are installed; zero otherwise.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_DBCSENABLED
member.summary: Nonzero if User32.dll supports DBCS; zero otherwise. (WinMe/95/98): Unicode

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CMOUSEBUTTONS
member.summary: Number of buttons on mouse, or zero if no mouse is installed.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXFIXEDFRAME
member.summary: Identical Values Changed After Windows NT 4.0

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYFIXEDFRAME
member.summary: Identical Values Changed After Windows NT 4.0

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXSIZEFRAME
member.summary: Identical Values Changed After Windows NT 4.0

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYSIZEFRAME
member.summary: Identical Values Changed After Windows NT 4.0

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_SECURE
member.summary: Nonzero if security is present; zero otherwise.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXEDGE
member.summary: Width of a 3-D border, in pixels. This is the 3-D counterpart of SM_CXBORDER

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYEDGE
member.summary: Height of a 3-D border, in pixels. This is the 3-D counterpart of SM_CYBORDER

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXMINSPACING
member.summary: Width of a grid cell for a minimized window, in pixels. Each minimized window fits into a rectangle this size when arranged. This value is always greater than or equal to SM_CXMINIMIZED.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYMINSPACING
member.summary: Height of a grid cell for a minimized window, in pixels. Each minimized window fits into a rectangle this size when arranged. This value is always greater than or equal to SM_CYMINIMIZED.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXSMICON
member.summary: Recommended width of a small icon, in pixels. Small icons typically appear in window captions and in small icon view

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYSMICON
member.summary: Recommended height of a small icon, in pixels. Small icons typically appear in window captions and in small icon view.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYSMCAPTION
member.summary: Height of a small caption, in pixels

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXSMSIZE
member.summary: Width of small caption buttons, in pixels.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYSMSIZE
member.summary: Height of small caption buttons, in pixels.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXMENUSIZE
member.summary: Width of menu bar buttons, such as the child window close button used in the multiple document interface, in pixels.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYMENUSIZE
member.summary: Height of menu bar buttons, such as the child window close button used in the multiple document interface, in pixels.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_ARRANGE
member.summary: Flags specifying how the system arranged minimized windows

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXMINIMIZED
member.summary: Width of a minimized window, in pixels.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYMINIMIZED
member.summary: Height of a minimized window, in pixels.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXMAXTRACK
member.summary: Default maximum width of a window that has a caption and sizing borders, in pixels. This metric refers to the entire desktop. The user cannot drag the window frame to a size larger than these dimensions. A window can override this value by processing the WM_GETMINMAXINFO message.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYMAXTRACK
member.summary: Default maximum height of a window that has a caption and sizing borders, in pixels. This metric refers to the entire desktop. The user cannot drag the window frame to a size larger than these dimensions. A window can override this value by processing the WM_GETMINMAXINFO message.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXMAXIMIZED
member.summary: Default width, in pixels, of a maximized top-level window on the primary display monitor.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYMAXIMIZED
member.summary: Default height, in pixels, of a maximized top-level window on the primary display monitor.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_NETWORK
member.summary: Least significant bit is set if a network is present; otherwise, it is cleared. The other bits are reserved for future use

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CLEANBOOT
member.summary: Value that specifies how the system was started: 0-normal, 1-failsafe, 2-failsafe /w net

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXDRAG
member.summary: Width of a rectangle centered on a drag point to allow for limited movement of the mouse pointer before a drag operation begins, in pixels.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYDRAG
member.summary: Height of a rectangle centered on a drag point to allow for limited movement of the mouse pointer before a drag operation begins. This value is in pixels. It allows the user to click and release the mouse button easily without unintentionally starting a drag operation.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_SHOWSOUNDS
member.summary: Nonzero if the user requires an application to present information visually in situations where it would otherwise present the information only in audible form; zero otherwise.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXMENUCHECK
member.summary: Width of the default menu check-mark bitmap, in pixels.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYMENUCHECK
member.summary: Height of the default menu check-mark bitmap, in pixels.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_SLOWMACHINE
member.summary: Nonzero if the computer has a low-end (slow) processor; zero otherwise

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_MIDEASTENABLED
member.summary: Nonzero if the system is enabled for Hebrew and Arabic languages, zero if not.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_MOUSEPRESENT
member.summary: Nonzero if a mouse is installed; zero otherwise. This value is rarely zero, because of support for virtual mice and because some systems detect the presence of the port instead of the presence of a mouse.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_XVIRTUALSCREEN
member.summary: Windows 2000 (v5.0+) Coordinate of the top of the virtual screen

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_YVIRTUALSCREEN
member.summary: Windows 2000 (v5.0+) Coordinate of the left of the virtual screen

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXVIRTUALSCREEN
member.summary: Windows 2000 (v5.0+) Width of the virtual screen

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYVIRTUALSCREEN
member.summary: Windows 2000 (v5.0+) Height of the virtual screen

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CMONITORS
member.summary: Number of display monitors on the desktop

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_SAMEDISPLAYFORMAT
member.summary: Windows XP (v5.1+) Nonzero if all the display monitors have the same color format, zero otherwise. Note that two displays can have the same bit depth, but different color formats. For example, the red, green, and blue pixels can be encoded with different numbers of bits, or those bits can be located in different places in a pixel's color value.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_IMMENABLED
member.summary: Windows XP (v5.1+) Nonzero if Input Method Manager/Input Method Editor features are enabled; zero otherwise

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CXFOCUSBORDER
member.summary: Windows XP (v5.1+) Width of the left and right edges of the focus rectangle drawn by DrawFocusRect. This value is in pixels.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CYFOCUSBORDER
member.summary: Windows XP (v5.1+) Height of the top and bottom edges of the focus rectangle drawn by DrawFocusRect. This value is in pixels.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_TABLETPC
member.summary: Nonzero if the current operating system is the Windows XP Tablet PC edition, zero if not.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_MEDIACENTER
member.summary: Nonzero if the current operating system is the Windows XP, Media Center Edition, zero if not.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CMETRICS_OTHER
member.summary: Metrics Other

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CMETRICS_2000
member.summary: Metrics Windows 2000

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_CMETRICS_NT
member.summary: Metrics Windows NT

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_REMOTESESSION
member.summary: Windows XP (v5.1+) This system metric is used in a Terminal Services environment. If the calling process is associated with a Terminal Services client session, the return value is nonzero. If the calling process is associated with the Terminal Server console session, the return value is zero. The console session is not necessarily the physical console - see WTSGetActiveConsoleSessionId for more information.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_SHUTTINGDOWN
member.summary: Windows XP (v5.1+) Nonzero if the current session is shutting down; zero otherwise

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.User32.SystemMetric.SM_REMOTECONTROL
member.summary: Windows XP (v5.1+) This system metric is used in a Terminal Services environment. Its value is nonzero if the current session is remotely controlled; zero otherwise

member.name: M:BlueOcean.Framework.Win32API.NativeMethods.Util.GetPInvokeStringLength(System.String)
member.summary: omputes the string size that should be passed to a typical Win32 call. his will be the character count under NT, and the ubyte count for Win95.
member.param: he string to get the size of.
member.returns: he count of characters or bytes, depending on what the pinvoke all wants
